column3: Welcome to Cellside Assistance! To access patient records, send one of the following: '<PATIENT NAME> or <PATIENT_ID>'. To query specific information about a patient, use the # symbol followed by the field name.

Welcome to Cellside Assistance! To access patient records, send one of the following: '<PATIENT NAME> or <PATIENT_ID>'. To query specific information about a patient, use the # symbol followed by the field name.
